cocktails.description: Often mistaken for a simple rum and cola, the Cuba Libre gains character from fresh lime juice, adding brightness and balance. Rum, cola, and lime form a refreshingly crisp highball. It’s casual, effervescent, and a classic summer sipper.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Fill the glass with ice, pour in rum, then cola.
Add lime juice and stir briefly to combine.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Cucumber Cooler
cocktails.description: A light, refreshing drink with cucumber, lime, gin, and soda water—crisp, cooling, and perfect for summer.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle cucumber slices with lime juice and syrup in a shaker.
Add gin and ice, shake until chilled.
Strain into a highball glass with ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with a cucumber wheel.

cocktails.name: Culto A La Vida
cocktails.description: A tropical, fruity blend of rum, apricot brandy, banana liqueur, pineapple juice, and grenadine for a vibrant, colorful drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a shaker with ice and add all liquid ingredients.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A classic Cuban cocktail with white rum, lime juice, and sugar—clean, tart, and perfectly balanced.
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A taut three-ingredient sour that showcases rum, lime, and sugar in razor-sharp balance. Shaken and served up, it’s zesty and crystalline. Perfect when you want refreshing precision.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Add rum, lime juice, and Simple Syrup to a shaker with ice.
Shake briskly until well-chilled.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
Optional lime wheel garnish.

cocktails.name: Damned if you do
cocktails.instructions:
Pour into shot glass
Put in mouth
Repeat as deemed necessary

cocktails.name: Dan Sabo's Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A modern twist on the classic whiskey sour, featuring bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and red wine float for added depth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Gently float red wine on top using the back of a spoon.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Danbooka
cocktails.instructions: pour it in and mix it

cocktails.name: Dandy
cocktails.description: A refined mix of rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, orange curaçao, and bitters, offering a rich, slightly sweet profile.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, orange curaçao, and bitters.
Stir until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktails.description: Spicy ginger beer meets rich dark rum for a stormy, refreshing highball. Lime adds brightness and snap. Simple and deeply satisfying.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Fill the glass with ice and add ginger beer.
Float dark rum over the top.
Garnish with a lime wedge and briefly stir before drinking.

cocktails.name: Dark and Stormy
cocktails.description: Ordinary Drink · Alcoholic · New Era Drinks
cocktails.instructions:
In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer
Garnish with lime wedge

cocktails.name: Dark Caipirinha
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes
Pour the cachaca into the glass
Stir well

cocktails.name: Darkwood Sling
cocktails.instructions:
There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering
Add one share of the liqueur
Then you add one share of Soda
For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic)
Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes

cocktails.name: Death in the Afternoon
cocktails.description: An Ernest Hemingway creation—absinthe topped with chilled Champagne for a potent, anise-scented sparkler.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour absinthe into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with Champagne.
Gently stir if desired.

cocktails.name: Delta Sunset
cocktails.description: A colorful drink combining Cointreau, Triple Sec, and Lemon Juice for a sweet citrus refreshment.
cocktails.instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice.

cocktails.name: Derby
cocktails.description: An official IBA cocktail combining bourbon, sweet vermouth, orange curaçao, and lime juice with bitters for a balanced, aromatic profile.
cocktails.instructions:
Lightly muddle mint (just to bruise) in base of stirring glass.
Add other ingredients, and stir with ice.
Fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a mint leave.

cocktails.name: Diesel
cocktails.instructions:
Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial
Top up with the cider
The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness

cocktails.name: Dirty Martini
cocktails.description: A savory twist on the classic Martini, with olive brine adding a salty, umami depth to gin and dry vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add gin, dry vermouth, and olive brine.
Stir until well-chilled and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an olive.

cocktails.name: Dirty Nipple
cocktails.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

cocktails.name: Dragonfly
cocktails.instructions:
In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale
Stir well
Garnish with the lime wedge

cocktails.name: Drinking Chocolate
cocktails.instructions:
Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes
(If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating)
Remove the bean and cinnamon
Add the chocolate
Mix until fully melted
Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream
Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are
For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate
Serve in coffee mug

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.description: A timeless mix of gin and dry vermouth—crisp, clean, and aromatically dry.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add gin and dry vermouth.
Stir until chilled, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Dry Rob Roy
cocktails.description: A Scotch whisky variation of the Rob Roy with dry vermouth. Dry, smoky, and refined, with a whisky-first profile. Sorbed direct and perfect for sophisticated sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir whisky and vermouth with ice until cold.
Strain into the glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Dubonnet Cocktail
cocktails.instructions:
Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Add the twist of lemon peel and serve

cocktails.name: Duchamp's Punch
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

cocktails.name: East India Cocktail
cocktails.description: A rich brandy cocktail with orange curaçao, pineapple syrup, and bitters—fruity, spiced, and warming.
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Eastside
cocktails.description: A bright, refreshing riff on the gin gimlet, accented with muddled cucumber and mint for a cooling, herbal lift.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Muddle cucumber slices in the bottom of a shaker.
Add mint leaves, gin, lime juice, and simple syrup.
Fill shaker with ice, shake vigorously, and double-strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a cucumber slice or ribbon and a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: El Diablo
cocktails.description: A tequila highball built on a tart, dark-berry backbone from crème de cassis. Lime brightens while ginger beer lifts with spice and fizz. It’s vivid, refreshing, and just a little wicked.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Build tequila, lime juice, and ginger beer over ice.
Float crème de cassis on top.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: El Presidente
cocktails.description: A Cuban classic of white rum, dry vermouth, orange curaçao, and a blush of grenadine. Refined, lightly sweet, and aromatic with citrus. An elegant aperitivo-style rum cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Optional orange twist garnish.

cocktails.name: Elderflower Caipirinha
cocktails.instructions:
Take the glass and muddle the lime in it
Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaca
Stir well and top with some more crushed ice

cocktails.name: Empellón Cocina's Fat-Washed Mezcal
cocktails.instructions:
To ensure that your pork fat is just as delicious as theirs, here’s their adobo marinade and what to do with it (you’ll also need a rack of ribs):
4 ancho chiles, 8 guajillo chiles and 4 chipotle chiles, plus 4 cloves roasted garlic, half a cup of cider vinegar, a quarter teaspoon of Mexican oregano, 1 teaspoon of ground black pepper, a whole clove, a quarter teaspoon of ground cinnamon and a half teaspoon of ground cumin
Toast the dried chiles and soak in water for at least an hour until they are rehydrated
Drain and discard the soaking liquid
Combine the soaked chiles with the remaining ingredients and purée until smooth
Cold smoke a rack of baby back pork ribs by taking a large hotel pan with woodchips on one side and charcoal on the other
Place another, smaller, pan with pork ribs, above the charcoal/woodchip pan
Ignite the charcoal, being careful to not ignite the woodchips
Cover both pans with foil and allow to smoke for 10-15 minutes, until desired level of smoke is achieved, then coat with adobo marinade and wrap in tin foil prior to placing ribs in a 300 degree oven for 7 hours
When the ribs have cooled, strain off the fat and use for the infusion
If you’re having a hard time coming up to the same kind of volume of fat, make up the balance with pork lard from a butcher
To get the same depth of flavor without the ribs, heat up the fat in a pot with a few spoons of the marinade
Once you’ve got your tub of seasoned pork fat in cooled liquid form, pour equal amounts of Ilegal Joven mezcal and fat into a sealable container
Seal the container and give it a really good shake, then put it in the freezer overnight
When the whole thing is separated and congealed, pour it through a fine mesh chinoise
If you don’t have a chinoise, try a fine mesh strainer, or if you don’t have one of those, try spooning off most of the fat
There will be some beads of orange fat left in the strained mezcal: run that through a few layers of cheesecloth (or coffee filters in a pinch) to get rid of the last of it
The mezcal is now ready for drinking, straight-up or in a cocktail
Habanero tincture
Slice habaneros and add 2 ounces Ilegal Joven mezcal
Allow to sit overnight or until desired level of heat is achieved
Cocktail
Combine mezcal and chocolate liqueur in a mixing glass with ice and stir for 45 seconds
Strain into chilled coupe
Carefully "sink" the coffee liqueur down the inside of the coupe over a spoon
Garnish with 5 drops habanero tincture

cocktails.name: Frosé
cocktails.instructions:
Step 1
Pour rosé into a 13x9" pan and freeze until almost solid (it won't completely solidify due to the alcohol), at least 6 hours
Step 2
Meanwhile, bring sugar and ½ cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan; cook, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves, about 3 minutes
Add strawberries, remove from heat, and let sit 30 minutes to infuse syrup with strawberry flavor
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a small bowl (do not press on solids); cover and chill until cold, about 30 minutes
Step 3
Scrape rosé into a blender
Add lemon juice, 3½ ounces strawberry syrup, and 1 cup crushed ice and purée until smooth
Transfer blender jar to freezer and freeze until frosé is thickened (aim for milkshake consistency), 25–35 minutes
Step 4
Blend again until frosé is slushy
Divide among glasses
Step 5
Do Ahead: Rosé can be frozen 1 week ahead

cocktails.instructions:
Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid
Add sugar to taste
The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste
Dash of salt
Raita is also good for the summer
Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.description: A punchy equal‑parts blend of gin, green Chartreuse, maraschino, and lime. Sweet, sour, and herbaceous in perfect tension. Snappy and unforgettable.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Nick and Nora glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
Serve without garnish.

cocktails.name: Lazy Coconut Paloma
cocktails.instructions:
Mix the coconut liqueur (preferably tequila) with the grapefruit juice and top with soda water
Garnish with a large grapefruit slice against the inside of the glass

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar

cocktails.name: Lemon Shot
cocktails.instructions:
Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass
light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second
Do shot quickly and suck on lemon
If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade

cocktails.name: Lemouroudji
cocktails.instructions:
Juice the lemons
Peel and grate the ginger
Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot
Let soak in the water
After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice
Chill, and serve

cocktails.name: Limona Corona
cocktails.instructions:
Open the Corona
Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum
The bottle should be filled to the top
Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand
Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix
Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink

cocktails.name: Loch Lomond
cocktails.instructions:
In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth
Stir well
Strain into a cocktail glass
Garnish with the lemon twist

cocktails.name: London Town
cocktails.instructions:
In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients
Stir well
Strain into a cocktail glass

cocktails.name: Lone Tree Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.description: A potent highball combining five spirits balanced with sweet and citrus, topped with cola for color. Despite its name, there's no tea—just a deceptive amber hue. Clever, boozy, and dangerously smooth.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Add all spirits, lemon juice, and syrup over ice.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon slice (optional).

cocktails.name: Long Island Tea
cocktails.instructions:
Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass
Add the splash of cola for color
Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve

cocktails.name: Long vodka
cocktails.instructions:
Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass
Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

cocktails.name: Lord And Lady
cocktails.instructions:
Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well

cocktails.name: Lunch Box
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a pint glass almost full with beer
Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top)
Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: A rum lover’s showcase—bright lime and orange over a nutty almond backbone. Rich, tart, and layered with tropical depth. A cornerstone of tiki culture.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain over crushed or cubed ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: A tiki icon blending light and dark rum, lime, orgeat, and orange liqueur. Layered, nutty, and tart with tropical complexity. A rum bar cornerstone.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain over crushed ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Spirit-forward and aromatic, the Manhattan marries whiskey with sweet vermouth and bitters. Stirred for clarity and velvet texture. A cherry garnish underscores its rich, classic profile.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Maple Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Sweet delicious nectar of the Gods. That's what this duo envoke when paired as one. Old friends who when together, make something more.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into stirring glass and add ice. 
2. Stir for 10-12 seconds
3. Strain into tumbler with ice. 
4. Garnish, serve and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions:
Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it
Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it
The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail
Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass

cocktails.name: Margarita (Classic)
cocktails.description: Bright and citrusy with tequila at the core, balanced by orange liqueur and lime. Salt heightens the flavors and adds contrast. Served up for a bracing, zesty finish.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Rim the glass lightly with salt and set aside.
Shake tequila, Cointreau, and fresh lime juice with ice.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel, if desired.

cocktails.name: Martinez
cocktails.description: The elegant forerunner to the Martini, combining gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino, and bitters. Softly sweet, botanical, and aromatic with balanced bite. A refined classic.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled.
Strain into the glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Martinez 2
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice
Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions:
Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes
Stir well
Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive

cocktails.name: Mary Pickford
cocktails.description: A Prohibition-era charmer of light rum, pineapple, grenadine, and maraschino. Lush and lightly sweet with a delicate cherry note. Pretty in color and polished on the palate.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Masala Chai
cocktails.instructions:
Bring 2 cups of water to boil
Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds
Let stand for a minute
Warm milk in a pot
Filter tea into cups
Add milk and sugar
That's IT

cocktails.name: Mauresque
cocktails.instructions:
1 - Pour the Ricard (or pastis)
2 - Pour the orgeat syrup
3 - Finally pour the water and add ice cubes at your convenience
Add the ice cubes at the end, otherwise the syrup and pastis do not mix well

cocktails.name: Melya
cocktails.instructions:
Brew espresso
In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup
Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part
The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix
Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce
Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve
Serve with cream

cocktails.name: Miami Vice
cocktails.instructions:
First: Mix pina colada with 2
5 oz
of rum with ice(set aside)
Second: Mix daiquiri with 2
5 oz
of rum with ice
Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together)

cocktails.name: Michelada
cocktails.instructions:
Mix the beer with tomato juice, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, or hot sauce
Served In a chilled, salt-rimmed glass

cocktails.name: Midnight Mint
cocktails.instructions:
If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder
Add ingredients into shaker with ice
Shake well then strain into cocktail glass

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.description: A brunch cornerstone marrying fresh orange juice with sparkling wine. Light bubbles and citrus perfume keep it crisp and celebratory. Effortless to make, delightful to drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Champagne Flute.
Pour chilled orange juice into the flute.
Top gently with sparkling wine.
Serve without garnish.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: A Southern classic where mint, sugar, and bourbon meet crushed ice. Frosty, fragrant, and dangerously sippable. Simple ingredients, refined ritual.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Gently muddle mint with Simple Syrup in the glass.
Add crushed ice and bourbon, then churn to frost the glass.
Top with more crushed ice and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: A Cuban highball of mint, lime, sugar, and rum lengthened with soda. It’s cooling, aromatic, and lightly effervescent. Built for warm weather and easy sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Lightly muddle mint with Simple Syrup and lime juice in the base of the glass.
Add rum and fill the glass with ice.
Top with soda and briefly stir to lift the mint.
Garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mojito Extra
cocktails.instructions:
Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda
Top it with Angostura

cocktails.name: Monkey Gland
cocktails.description: A playful name for a bold combo of gin, orange juice, grenadine, and absinthe. Fruity, spicy, and herbal with a luminous pink hue. A memorable pre-dinner concoction.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Monkey Wrench
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well

cocktails.name: Moranguito
cocktails.instructions: first you put the absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: A zingy combo of vodka, lime, and fiery ginger beer. Built over ice in a frosty copper mug for snap and chill. Zesty, lively, and endlessly drinkable.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Copper mug.
Build vodka and lime juice over ice.
Top with ginger beer and give a brief stir.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Mudslinger
cocktails.instructions:
Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl
Stir well!

cocktails.name: Mulled Wine
cocktails.instructions:
Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes
Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy

cocktails.name: Munich Mule
cocktails.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Pour Gin and Lime Juice
Fill glass with Ginger Beer
Garnish with Cucumer and Lime slice

cocktails.name: National Aquarium
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice
Shake well
Serve on the rocks

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: Equal parts gin, bitter, and vermouth make this the archetype of balanced aperitivo cocktails. It’s herbal, citrusy, and firmly bitter with a lush texture from stirring. Best served over a large cube with a bright citrus aroma.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Prepare garnish of orange twist.
Add gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir until cold and strain over a large ice cube.
Garnish with the orange twist.

cocktails.name: Negroni Sbagliato
cocktails.description: A lighter, bubbly version of the Negroni, substituting sparkling wine for gin. Bitter-sweet, refreshing, and delicate. Perfect for late afternoons or aperitivos.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Wine glass.
Pour Campari and vermouth over ice.
Top with sparkling wine and stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: New York Lemonade
cocktails.instructions:
Serve in a chilled cocktail glass
Lemon and sugar the rim
Stir and Strain

cocktails.name: New York Sour
cocktails.instructions:
Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass
Float claret on top
Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve

cocktails.name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
cocktails.instructions:
Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug
Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds
Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves
Fill mug with milk
Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts

cocktails.name: Nutty Irishman
cocktails.instructions: Serve over ice

cocktails.name: Oatmeal Cookie
cocktails.instructions:
Just mix it all together
It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice
Tastes like an oatmeal cookie

cocktails.name: Old Cuban
cocktails.description: A modern classic blending aged rum, mint, citrus, and sparkling wine. Rich and aromatic, where mint and bitters complement a refined rum base. Effervescent, elegant, and celebratory.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass.
Muddle mint leaves gently with lime juice and syrup in a shaker.
Add rum, bitters, and ice, then shake and strain into the glass.
Top with sparkling wine and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: A minimalist whiskey classic that highlights spirit, bitters, and sweetness in perfect balance. The drink is stirred over ice for clarity and texture, then finished with a citrus oil perfume. It’s boozy, silky, and timeless.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Prepare garnish of orange twist.
Add whiskey, Simple Syrup, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir until well-chilled and strain into the glass over fresh ice.
Express the orange twist over the drink and garnish.

cocktails.name: Old Pal
cocktails.description: A dry, bracing cousin of the Negroni using dry vermouth and whiskey. Bitter, herbal, and ultra-refreshing served over a big cube. Lean and sophisticated.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until cold.
Strain over a large ice cube.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Orange Crush
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

cocktails.name: Orange Oasis
cocktails.instructions:
Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes
Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve

cocktails.name: Orange Push-up
cocktails.instructions:
Combine liquors in a blender
Add a half scoop of ice and blend
Garnish with an orange and cherry flag
So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

cocktails.name: Orange Rosemary Collins
cocktails.instructions:
Add the spirits to the bottom of the glass and top equally with the mixer drinks
Garnish with orange slices inside the glass as well as some rosemary on top

cocktails.name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
cocktails.instructions:
Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan
Stir over low heat until chocolate melts
Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often
Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy
Return to heat and bring to boil again
Remove from heat, whisk until frothy
Repeat heating and whisking once again
Discard orange peel
Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs

cocktails.name: Orange Whip
cocktails.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir

cocktails.name: Orangeade
cocktails.instructions:
Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well
Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw

cocktails.name: Orgasm
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.description: Mexico’s bubbly grapefruit highball—tart, salty, and wildly refreshing. Tequila and lime are stretched with pink grapefruit soda. A salted rim snaps all the flavors into focus.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Rim the glass lightly with salt and fill with ice.
Add tequila and lime juice, then top with pink grapefruit soda.
Give a brief stir and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Paper Plane
cocktails.description: A modern equal-parts sour that’s citrusy, bittersweet, and impeccably balanced. Bourbon anchors Aperol and amaro against sharp lemon. Zippy and highly sessionable.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Paradise
cocktails.description: A fruit-forward gin classic with apricot brandy and orange juice. Rounded sweetness supports bright citrus and botanicals. Balanced and sunny.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Passion Fruit Martini
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir
Garnish with half a passion fruit piece

cocktails.name: Pegu Club
cocktails.description: A gin cocktail with orange bitters, lime, and curaçao—balanced, citrusy, and dry. Served up with smooth elegance. A favorite from Colonial-era Burma bars.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.description: Smoky Scotch meets zesty lemon, honey, and spicy ginger in this modern favorite. It’s soothing yet vivid, with a pleasant warmth. Ideal for cooler nights.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Shake whisky, lemon juice, and honey syrup with ice.
Strain over fresh ice.
Optional: add a thin slice of ginger as garnish.

cocktails.name: Pimm's Cup
cocktails.description: Summer in a glass: Pimm’s, citrus, and fizz with fresh garnishes. Lightly spiced and herbal with a refreshing finish. Built long for easy garden sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Build Pimm’s and lemonade over ice.
Briefly stir to combine.
Garnish with cucumber, orange slice, and mint.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.description: Creamy coconut, sweet pineapple, and rum in a lush tropical blend. Blended or shaken, it’s velvety and vacation-ready. A sunny classic for beach weather.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass.
Shake all ingredients hard with ice (or blend with crushed ice).
Pour into the glass; add more ice if needed.
Garnish with a pineapple slice.

cocktails.name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
cocktails.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and liquify

cocktails.name: Pineapple Paloma
cocktails.instructions:
Rub the rim of each glass with lime slice and dip into salt
Add ice, tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice and top with pineapple soda
Give it a quick stir
Garnish with fresh pineapple or lime

cocktails.name: Pink Gin
cocktails.instructions:
Pour the bitters into a wine glass
Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess
Pour the gin into the glass
Do not add ice

cocktails.name: Pink Lady
cocktails.description: A frothy and pink gin cocktail with apple brandy, lemon, and egg white. Elegant, silky, and delightfully rosy. A vintage feminine favorite.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Dry shake all ingredients for creaminess.
Add ice and shake again until frothy.
Strain into the chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Pink Moon
cocktails.instructions:
Slowly shake in a shaker with ice, strain into a square whiskey glass
Top with fresh ice
Add the blackberries to garnish
Add flowers and a green leaf for a special look!

cocktails.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
cocktails.instructions: Shake well

cocktails.name: Pink Penocha
cocktails.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.description: Foamy and citrus-bright, this South American classic spotlights pisco’s floral character. A touch of sugar softens the edges, while bitters perfume the foam. Elegant and refreshing.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Coupe.
Dry shake pisco, lime, syrup, and egg (if using).
Add ice and shake again, then fine strain into the coupe.
Dot bitters over the foam and serve.

cocktails.name: Planter's Punch
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice
Shake well
Pour into large glass, filled with ice
Add Angostura bitters, "on top"
Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple

cocktails.name: Planter’s Punch
cocktails.description: A Jamaican rum punch with orange and lime juices, sugar, and bitters. Fruity, boozy, and vibrant—a punch bowl classic in single-serve form. Handy, tropical, and fun.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Popped cherry
cocktails.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

cocktails.name: Poppy Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Pornstar Martini
cocktails.instructions:
Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes
Shake well
Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass
Cut passion fruit in half and use as garnish
Pour prosecco into a chilled shot glass and serve alongside the martini

cocktails.name: Port And Starboard
cocktails.instructions:
Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine
Serve without mixing

cocktails.name: Port Wine Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Port Wine Flip
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass
Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve

cocktails.name: Porto flip
cocktails.description: A rich, velvety nightcap from brandy, tawny port, and egg yolk. Deep, warm, and indulgent with silky texture. Perfect for post-dinner sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Wine glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice until rich and creamy.
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Porto Tonic
cocktails.description: A refreshing highball blending tawny port with tonic water. Sweet, slightly bitter, and effervescent—light, lower-alcohol sipping. Garnished with citrus for brightness.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Add tawny port over ice.
Top with tonic water and stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Pure Passion
cocktails.instructions: Mix up all ingredients with a cocktail stirrer and serve with crushed ice with mint and edible flour if available

cocktails.name: Pysch Vitamin Light
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice

cocktails.name: Quaker's Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Queen Bee
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Queen Charlotte
cocktails.instructions:
Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes
Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve

cocktails.name: Queen Elizabeth
cocktails.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Quentin
cocktails.instructions:
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream
Shake well
Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg

cocktails.name: Quick F**K
cocktails.instructions:
In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first
Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

cocktails.name: Quick-sand
cocktails.instructions:
Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice
The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

cocktails.name: Rabo de Galo
cocktails.description: A Brazilian classic marrying cachaça with bitter-sweet vermouth. Earthy cane notes meet herbal aromatics for a compact, aperitif-style sip. Simple, sturdy, and satisfying.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Stir cachaça and vermouth with ice.
Strain over fresh ice or serve up.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass
Sip cautiously

cocktails.name: Radler
cocktails.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite)

cocktails.name: Rail Splitter
cocktails.instructions:
Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass
Fill up with ginger ale

cocktails.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: A creamy, lavender-scented gin fizz with egg white and heavy cream. Fluffy and frothy, with citrus, floral, and velvety layers. A brunch staple renowned for its luxurious mouthfeel.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Collins glass.
Dry shake gin, lemon juice, Simple Syrup, cream, and egg white.
Add ice and shake again vigorously.
Strain into glass and top with soda; no garnish needed.

cocktails.name: Raspberry Cooler
cocktails.instructions:
Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well

cocktails.name: Raspberry Julep
cocktails.instructions:
Softly muddle the mint leaves and raspberry syrup in the bottom of the cup
Add crushed ice and Bourbon to the cup and then stir
Top with more ice, garnish with a mint sprig

cocktails.name: Red Snapper
cocktails.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

cocktails.name: Remember the Maine
cocktails.description: A potent rye and cherry-forward classic with a splash of absinthe. Bold, herbal, and brightened by vermouth and cherry notes. A storied and distinguished mixing glass prototype.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice.
Strain into the glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Rob Roy
cocktails.description: The Scotch whisky take on a Manhattan, richer and lightly smoky. Sweet vermouth rounds the edges while bitters add structure. Stirred and spirit-forward, it’s urbane and timeless.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir whisky, vermouth, and bitters with ice.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Rose
cocktails.description: A delicate mix of gin, vermouth, kirsch, and strawberry liqueur. Floral, aromatic, and sophisticated with subtle fruit notes. Named for its elegant pink hue.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Rosemary Blue
cocktails.instructions:
1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass
Swirl well to combine
2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water
3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix

cocktails.name: Royal Fizz
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass
Fill with cola and serve

cocktails.name: Royal Flush
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice
Strain into glass

cocktails.name: Ruby Tuesday
cocktails.instructions:
Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes
Add grenadine and stir

cocktails.name: Rum Cobbler
cocktails.instructions:
Pour dark rum in an old-fashioned glass, add simple syrup and soda water
Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full.
Stir well
Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices

cocktails.name: Rum Cooler
cocktails.instructions:
Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge

cocktails.name: Rum Milk Punch
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass
Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve

cocktails.name: Rum Old-fashioned
cocktails.instructions:
Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass
When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum
Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve

cocktails.name: Rum Punch
cocktails.description: A fruit-forward party classic built on rum, citrus, and tropical juices. Grenadine ties color and sweetness together. Easygoing and perfect for batches.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Collins glass.
Build all ingredients over ice and stir briefly.
Adjust sweetness and citrus to taste.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Rum Runner
cocktails.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice

cocktails.name: Rum Screwdriver
cocktails.instructions:
Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes
Add orange juice, stir, and serve

cocktails.name: Rum Sour
cocktails.instructions:
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar
Shake well
Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry

cocktails.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktails.description: A festive, sparkling punch of vodka, lemon, sugar, and crème de cassis topped with bubbles. Fruity and bright with a lively mousse. Designed for celebrations and warm weather.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Wine glass.
Shake vodka, lemon, and syrup with ice and strain over fresh ice.
Add crème de cassis.
Top with sparkling wine and give a gentle stir.

cocktails.name: Salty Dog
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass
Stir well and serve
(Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred
)

cocktails.name: San Francisco
cocktails.instructions:
Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom
garnish with orange and strawberry

cocktails.name: Sangria
cocktails.instructions:
Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate
Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste
Serve in wine glasses

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.description: An intense, aromatic New Orleans classic built without ice in the glass. Rye (or cognac) is seasoned with sugar and Peychaud’s bitters, and a whisper of absinthe. Powerful, perfumed, and dry.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Rinse the chilled glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Stir rye, rich smple syrup, and Peychaud’s bitters with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass without ice.
Express a lemon twist over the top and garnish.

cocktails.name: Scofflaw
cocktails.description: A tart, rye-era cocktail of whiskey, dry vermouth, lemon, and grenadine with orange bitters. Brisk and lightly spiced with a ruby glow. Sharp, snappy, and satisfying.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Scooter
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Scotch Sour
cocktails.instructions:
Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass
Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.description: The simple and iconic vodka-orange juice mix—the screwdriver. Bright, fruity, and effortless. A brunch and day-drinking staple.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Add vodka over ice, top with orange juice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Sea breeze
cocktails.description: A crisp, refreshing combination of vodka, cranberry, and grapefruit juice. Tart, slightly bitter, and hydrating. A light, healthy-feeling palate cleanser.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Add vodka over ice.
Top with cranberry and grapefruit juices.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.description: A fun, fruity highball combining vodka, peach schnapps, and orange-cranberry juices. Bright, sweet, and very approachable—made for summer parties. Cheers to easy sipping!
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Build all ingredients over ice and stir gently.
No shake required.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Shark Attack
cocktails.instructions:
Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can
If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so
Mix into pitcher
Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut)
Mix well
Pour into glass of crushed ice
Excellent!

cocktails.name: Sherry Flip
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg). with ice and strain into a Nick & Nora glass.
Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

cocktails.name: Shot-gun
cocktails.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.description: Cognac’s warmth meets bright citrus and orange liqueur in this elegant sour. Crisp edges and a gently sweet core make it highly drinkable. A sugared rim is optional for extra sparkle.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Optionally sugar the rim and set aside.
Shake cognac, Cointreau, and lemon juice with ice.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.description: A gin-based tropical highball with cherry and herbal complexity from Benedictine. Fruity, effervescent, and suitable for poolside lounging. Iconic and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Shake gin, cherry liqueur, Benedictine, lime, and syrup with ice.
Strain into glass over ice and top with soda.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Sloe Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: A fruity, effervescent cooler starring sloe gin’s tart berry notes. Lemon and soda keep it light and zippy. Easygoing and refreshing.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Collins glass.
Shake sloe gin, lemon, and syrup with ice.
Strain into the glass over fresh ice and top with soda.
Give a brief stir and serve.

cocktails.name: Smut
cocktails.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold

cocktails.name: Snowball
cocktails.instructions:
Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat
Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon
Serve at once

cocktails.name: Snowday
cocktails.instructions:
Stir all ingredients with ice
Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice
Express orange peel over drink and garnish

cocktails.name: Sol Y Sombra
cocktails.instructions:
Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve
(The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why
Thanks, Kirby
)

cocktails.name: Southside
cocktails.description: Mint and gin meet lemon and sugar for a herbaceous sour with a cooling finish. It’s crisp, aromatic, and neatly polished. A crowd-pleaser that bridges classic and garden-fresh.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice, gently bruising the mint.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
Optional mint leaf garnish.

cocktails.name: Space Odyssey
cocktails.instructions:
Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu
Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice
Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries

cocktails.name: Spritz
cocktails.description: Ordinary Drink · Alcoholic · New Era Drinks
cocktails.instructions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve

cocktails.name: Stinger
cocktails.description: Brandy and white crème de menthe combine for a minty nightcap. Cooling sweetness relaxes cognac’s edges into a smooth, after-dinner sip. Best served very cold.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake ingredients hard with ice (or stir for a silkier texture).
Strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Stone Sour
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktails.description: A WWII‑era hangover helper combining gin, brandy (or whiskey), lime, bitters, and ginger beer. Zesty, spicy, and surprisingly balanced. Built tall for maximum refreshment.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Build all ingredients over ice except ginger beer.
Top with ginger beer and give a brief stir.
Optional lime wedge garnish.

cocktails.name: Sweet Bananas
cocktails.instructions:
Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended
Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up

cocktails.name: Sweet Sangria
cocktails.instructions:
Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool
Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges
Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours
Serve in tall glasses with a straw

cocktails.name: Sweet Tooth
cocktails.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like

cocktails.name: Tennesee Mud
cocktails.instructions:
Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto
Add Cream on top

cocktails.name: Tequila Fizz
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes
Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve

cocktails.name: Tequila Slammer
cocktails.instructions: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved CO2

cocktails.name: Tequila Sour
cocktails.instructions:
Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass
Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: Sunny layers of orange and red create the namesake sunrise effect. Tequila provides backbone while grenadine adds color and pomegranate sweetness. A retro crowd-pleaser that remains effortlessly drinkable.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Add tequila and orange juice over ice and stir briefly.
Slowly pour grenadine to sink for a sunrise effect.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Tequila Surprise
cocktails.instructions:
Fill shot glass with Tequila
Add drops of Tobasco sauce

cocktails.name: Texas Rattlesnake
cocktails.instructions:
Mix all ingredients and Shake well
Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end

cocktails.name: Texas Sling
cocktails.instructions:
Blend with Ice until smooth
Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream

cocktails.name: Thai Coffee
cocktails.instructions:
Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker
Brew coffee as usual, let it cool
In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice)
Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass
Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon
This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away

cocktails.name: Thai Iced Tea
cocktails.instructions:
Combine Thai tea (i
e
, the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended
Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes
Garnish with mint leaves
Makes 2 servings

cocktails.name: The Galah
cocktails.instructions: Mix together the alcoholic portions and top with Pineapple and Lime juice

cocktails.name: The Jimmy Conway
cocktails.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Pour in The Irishman and Disaronno
Fill to the top with Cranberry Juice
Garnish with a slice of lemon…Enjoy!

cocktails.name: The Last Word
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass

cocktails.name: The Laverstoke
cocktails.instructions:
1) Squeeze two lime wedges into a balloon glass then add the cordial, Bombay Sapphire and MARTINI Rosso Vermouth, swirl to mix
2) Fully fill the glass with cubed ice and stir to chill
3) Top with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and gently stir again to combine
4) Garnish with a snapped ginger slice and an awoken mint sprig

cocktails.name: The Philosopher
cocktails.instructions:
Add all the spirits in a shaker (best to use Hendricks gin) as well as the orange bitters and lemon juice
Strain into a Margarita glass, top with Prosecco

cocktails.name: Thriller
cocktails.instructions:
In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients
Shake well
Strain into a cocktail glass

cocktails.name: Tipperary
cocktails.description: An Irish whiskey cocktail brightened by sweet vermouth and green Chartreuse. Herbal, smooth and subtly sweet with citrus bitters. A sophisticated sip with layered complexity.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir whiskey, vermouth, Chartreuse, and bitters with ice.
Strain into the glass.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.description: A classic gin highball with lemon and soda water. Bright, citrusy, and refreshing — effervescent every time. A timeless long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Collins glass.
Combine gin, lemon juice, and Simple Syrup over ice.
Top with soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Tomato Tang
cocktails.instructions:
Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended
Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up

cocktails.name: Tommy’s Margarita
cocktails.description: A modern classic that swaps orange liqueur for agave nectar. The result is a pure agave-forward profile with bright lime. Served on the rocks for a refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Prepare garnish of lime wedge.
Shake tequila, agave nectar, and lime juice with ice.
Strain over fresh ice in the rocks glass.
Garnish with the lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Toronto
cocktails.description: A whiskey old-fashioned cousin sweetened lightly and seasoned with Fernet. Bitter-minty aromatics frame a dry, spirit-forward core. Serious, sleek, and bracing.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Optional orange twist garnish.

cocktails.name: Turf Club (1900)
cocktails.instructions:
Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Add the twist of orange peel and serve

cocktails.name: Turkeyball
cocktails.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.description: A martini-era classic layering gin with dry vermouth, maraschino, and a touch of absinthe. Dry, aromatic, and faintly floral-anise. Polished and precise.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until very cold.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Optional lemon twist garnish.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo Cocktail
cocktails.instructions:
Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest

cocktails.name: Valencia Cocktail
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Vampiro
cocktails.description: A savory-spicy Mexican highball with tequila, tomato, citrus, and heat. Worcestershire, salt, and hot sauce season it like a cocktail-meets-michelada. Bold, bracing, and thirst-quenching.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Highball glass.
Build all ingredients over ice and roll once between tins.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Serve without garnish or add a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Van Vleet
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve

cocktails.name: Vermouth Cassis
cocktails.instructions:
Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes
Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.description: A strong, ultra-dry Martini variation that blends gin, vodka, and aromatized wine. Stirred ice-cold for a razor-sharp profile. Clean, bracing, and unapologetically boozy.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with plenty of ice until very cold.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vesper Martini
cocktails.description: A powerful, dry martini variant that blends gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc. Crisp, strong, and elegant. Bond’s signature cocktail with a citrus twist.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake (or stir) all ingredients with plenty of ice until icy cold.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vesuvio
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve

cocktails.name: Veteran
cocktails.instructions:
Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes
Stir well

cocktails.name: Victor
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Victory Collins
cocktails.instructions:
Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes
Add the slice of orange and serve

cocktails.name: Vieux Carré
cocktails.description: A complex, spirit-forward New Orleans classic blending rye, cognac, vermouth, and Benedictine. Deeply herbal and smooth, with layered bitterness from Peychaud’s. Luxurious and richly aromatic.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with a lemon or orange twist and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Vodka And Tonic
cocktails.instructions:
Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes
Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve

cocktails.name: Vodka Martini
cocktails.description: Crystal-clear and razor-dry, the vodka martini showcases cold purity over botanicals. A whisper of dry vermouth adds aroma and structure. Garnish choice nudges it savory or bright.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Stir vodka and vermouth with plenty of ice until very cold.
Strain into the chilled glass.
Garnish with an olive (or a lemon twist).

cocktails.name: Vodka Russian
cocktails.instructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink

cocktails.name: Vodka Slime
cocktails.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Add vodka, 7-up then finish with the lime juice

cocktails.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A silky balance of whiskey, lemon, and sugar with optional egg white for foam. Bright and tangy with a plush texture. Timeless and satisfying.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Dry shake all ingredients (without ice) if using egg.
Add ice and shake again until well-chilled.
Strain over fresh ice and optionally dot with bitters.

cocktails.name: Whisky Mac
cocktails.instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.description: A refined gin sour sweetened with triple sec. Silky and bright with a clean citrus finish. Optional egg white adds a luxurious foam.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Dry shake all ingredients if using egg, then add ice and shake again.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
Serve without garnish.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.description: Creamy and comforting—coffee liqueur and vodka capped with rich cream. Built over ice for a soft, rounded sip. A dessert-like classic with gentle sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass.
Build vodka and coffee liqueur over ice.
Float or gently stir in the cream.
Serve without garnish.

cocktails.name: White Wine Sangria
cocktails.instructions:
Chop the Lemon, Lime and other fruits into large chunks
Fill the Pitcher with the white wine and mix in the Apple Brandy
Top to taste with soda water

cocktails.name: Whitecap Margarita
cocktails.instructions:
Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth
This makes one drink

cocktails.name: Wine Cooler
cocktails.instructions:
Mix wine and soft drink
Pour into glass
Add ice

cocktails.name: Wine Punch
cocktails.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice

cocktails.name: Winter Paloma
cocktails.instructions:
Everyone’s favourite Paloma gets a delicious Indian makeover
Tequila reposado infused with “Timur Pepper” which has citrusy & grapefruit notes and is grown at the foothills of Himalaya
It also produces a slightly numbing and tingling sensation on your lip when consumed
We have also spiced up the fresh grapefruit juice with the warming spice blend from Himalaya
The combination of all these interesting elements has allowed us to elevate your Paloma sipping experience

cocktails.name: Winter Rita
cocktails.instructions:
Salt rim
Combine all ingredients, shake with ice, and strain over fresh ice
⠀

cocktails.name: Yellow Bird
cocktails.description: A sunny Caribbean sour of rum, Galliano, triple sec, and lime. Vanilla-herbal sweetness threads through bright citrus. Tropical, lively, and fragrant.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Cocktail glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice.
Fine strain into the chilled glass.
No garnish required.

cocktails.name: Zambeer
cocktails.instructions:
Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir
Add ice

cocktails.name: Zenmeister
cocktails.instructions: Mix together and enjoy

cocktails.name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
cocktails.instructions:
Serve without ice
At least the juice shold have room temperature

cocktails.name: Zima Blaster
cocktails.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima
Mix and enjoy

cocktails.name: Zimadori Zinger
cocktails.instructions:
Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori
Don't stir
Garnish with a cherry

cocktails.name: Zinger
cocktails.instructions:
Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps
Do the same with the Surge Cola
Then down it like Scheetz would

cocktails.name: Zipperhead
cocktails.instructions:
Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor
Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i
e
Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top)

cocktails.name: Zippy's Revenge
cocktails.instructions:
Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto
shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid
serve cold

cocktails.name: Zizi Coin-coin
cocktails.instructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass

cocktails.name: Zoksel
cocktails.instructions:
No specific mixing instructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass
The lemon goes with it

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.description: A legendary tiki cocktail of multiple rums, fruit juices, and passionfruit liqueurs. Bold, boozy, and layered with tropical flavors and spice. Sipped slowly and served with flair.
cocktails.instructions:
Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass.
Shake all ingredients except overproof rum (if using) with ice.
Strain into glass filled with ice.
Float overproof rum on top and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Zorbatini
cocktails.instructions:
Prepare like a Martini
Garnish with a green olive

cocktails.name: Zorro
cocktails.instructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top
